body.p: The assets directory contains the files that are used by the 4D app to present a publication. It includes the following directories:

li.p: The CSS files for a publication

Directories that contain:
Topic files
data files such as search indexes and a map to link topics to arbitrary IDs
graphics files -- images for topic content
DITAMAP files
XSLT files
Javascript libraries, including Angular, jQuery, jQuery.Fancytree, and Stemmer
